# Undergraduate Research Students 
  * Spring/Summer: Apply for the NSERC USRA or Stewart Award (not recruiting in 2026).
  * Fall/Winter: Participate in a senior research project in statistics (to be recruited for 2026/2027).

# Graduate Students

* Masters and PhD (Statistics, Computational Science and Engineering): Apply for positions starting in the Fall.

# Postdoctoral Researchers
* We will announce at [our research team's news](https://pratheepaj.github.io/team/)

For more details on when and how to apply, please visit our [Join Us](https://pratheepaj.github.io/joinus) page.
